short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds duplicate text in pages and makes in-page links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finds duplicate text in pages and makes in-page links.

This is useful for things like game walkthroughs that are plain text but have searchable "tags" to sections of the page below.

You can use the default square-bracket search or define your own set of tags to link together.

This extension remembers your settings per page so you can always come back to it later.
